mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_elder_user( id, sys_user_id, easemobID, easemobPassword, memberCardID, create_date, update_date, loginToken, sys_hospital_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sysUserID}, #{easemobID}, #{easemobPassword}, #{memberCardID}, now(), now(), #{loginToken}, #{sysHospitalID} )
mapper.select: SELECT *,sys_user_id as sysUserID FROM `sys_elder_user` where easemobID=#{easemobID}
select seu.memberCardID from sys_elder_user seu order by seu.memberCardID desc limit 1

SELECT seu.id,seu.sys_user_id as sysUserID,seu.easemobID,seu.easemobPassword,seu.memberCardID,seu.loginToken, seu.sys_hospital_id as sysHospitalID FROM `sys_elder_user` seu inner join sys_user su on su.id=seu.sys_user_id where sys_hospital_id=#{sysHospitalID} and su.del_flag=0
